name: Mystique
description:
Our extension produces noise, while you are normally surfing the web. In the background, different websites will be opened. These websites are random but connected to a specified stereotype.
Key Features:

Browse the web while your user profile is obscured by fake activity!
Random traffic is generated to obscure your real user profile!
You pick what your fake profile should look like!
Illegal traffic is prevented by using up-to-date blacklists!
If you have no data flat: define the limit of traffic generated!
